q: Monday, February 7, 2011 LOS ANGELES- Simon Cowell wants his new Fox talent series "The X Factor" to include controversy, vocal groups and, maybe, Paula Abdul on the judging panel. We've spoken to her, she knows I'm a big fan, Simon Cowell said of his former fellow "American Idol" judge. "I've always said at some point we are going to be working together." "There was an overreaction to Sergio Marchionne 's comments, which shows how fragile the Italian economic system is," said Turin Mayor Sergio Chiamparino , with whom Sergio Marchionne regularly plays cards. I told Sergio Marchionne he should better explain his business model, which represents a revolution for the Italian culture.-- With assistance from Tim Higgins in Detroit and Marco Bertacche in Milan. In a posting on his blog( www.drhawass.com/blog/state-egyptian-antiquities-3-february-2011), Zahi Hawass said the incident at the museum resulted in "70 broken objects, all of which can be restored." I want people to know that after nine days of protests, the monuments are safe, Zahi Hawass said. "If anything happens, I will announce it." program " Fareed Zakaria GPS," which Liza McGuirk executive produced and where Eric Schmidt was a regular guest. When Eric Schmidt filmed a pilot for CNN in August, Liza McGuirk oversaw the production. A source told us, Eric Schmidt wants to be a talk-show host. He's been working with Liza McGuirk to develop a show, but he has not yet been picked up by any network. interview and a conference call with analysts, with Eric Schmidt describing Google Inc. 's co-founders as his "best friends." "I believe Larry is ready" to be CEO, Eric Schmidt said during the call. It's time for him to have a shot at running this. Page hailed Eric Schmidt as a "tremendous leader" whose contributions exceeded all expectations. "There is really no one else in the universe that could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done," Page said.

sold 8 million Kinect units in just two months. That's far beyond the company's 5 million estimate-- which was raised from an initial estimate of 3 million right before the system's launch. This has been the biggest holiday and the biggest year ever for Xbox, said CEO Steve Ballmer during a keynote address at January's Consumer Electronics Show. people give him credit for." Though Dermot O'Leary admits he enjoys working with Simon Cowell , he and the rest of the people who work with the music mogul hate to let him down. He added: Don't get me wrong, he's still my boss, but he's sort of a Victorian father- you'd hate to let him down. On the occasion that happens I literally feel sick. While Dermot O'Leary would love to continue working with Simon Cowell by taking a role on the US' X Factor' he is trying not to worry about it. Subscribe to RSSMost Popular in: Entertainment
